content: pattern format written pattern no chart pattern language english skill level beginner simple rasta hat is worked in the round size to fit a head circumference of 54 59 cm 21 23 in head circumference materials needed yarn malabrigo rasta one skein knitting needles 10 mm us 15 circular needles techniques knit in the round knit & purl stitches decrease stitch if have any questions please contact me thank you so much
